name: Backend Launcher
description: Gets backend services running locally. Analyzes generated code, installs dependencies, starts servers.

stages.name: Analyze Backend
stages.description: Scans the project for backend code - servers, APIs, databases. Figures out what needs to run.

stages.name: Setup Backend
stages.description: Installs dependencies, sets up databases, configures environment.

stages.name: Launch Backend
stages.description: Starts the backend services and verifies they're running.

stages.name: Connect Frontend
stages.description: Updates frontend config to point to the running backend.

metadata.notes: Run after game implementation to get backend services online locally.
